CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains the warm-up task to MOT . CHI enters room and INV leaves
MOT puts her bag on the chair
CHI turns around to face MOT
MOT's back is to the camera . She is putting her bags on the chair near the desk
CHI holds out the football to MOT
MOT takes the ball from CHI
CHI looks at toys on the floor
CHI runs over to the chair
MOT holds out the football to CHI
MOT walks to the center of the room and looks at CHI
CHI looks up at the camera
CHI walks around table toward desk
MOT looks at floor . <5-6> MOT looks at CHI
camera makes noise as it follows CHI
<bef> MOT looks at camera . MOT looks at CHI
CHI stares at the camera as he moves around the table
MOT looks at camera and CHI
CHI continues to stare at the camera
MOT looks down at the toys
MOT picks up a toy car
MOT rolls car back and forth
MOT picks up car and shows it to CHI
MOT looks at CHI then at car
MOT shows CHI the toy car
MOT points to the seat . <aft> MOT looks at CHI then leans forward toward CHI
CHI's back is facing the camera
MOT looks at CHI then down at floor
MOT looks at duck . <aft> MOT looks at CHI
MOT picks up the rubber duck and holds it in front of CHI
CHI reaches out for the duck
MOT looks at CHI and leans forward
CHI puts duck near his face
<$=1> MOT grabs CHI and tries to turn him around
MOT watches CHI . MOT looks down at the football
CHI turns his head toward MOT
<1-4> MOT looks at football . MOT looks at CHI
CHI looks at MOT then looks at the camera
<$=1> MOT grabs book and draws it near to her
MOT looks at CHI then at book
CHI looks at MOT and the book
MOT looks at CHI while pointing to various parts of the book cover
MOT turns to book around and show it to CHI
CHI is still standing next to the table
<2> MOT looks at book . MOT is still pointing to picture on cover
<$=1> MOT taps picture with her finger
MOT looks at CHI and points to kitten
MOT taps her finger on the picture of the kitten and looks at CHI
MOT points to letter . <1-2> MOT looks at book . <3> MOT looks at CHI
MOT looks at book and points to letter B
CHI turns and looks at the camera
MOT leans the book on her legs displaying page to CHI
MOT points to fish and looks at CHI
CHI squats down and looks at the picture
MOT looks at and taps picture
CHI points to picture of ice cream
<bef> MOT points to picture of ice cream
MOT points to and looks at picture
MOT taps and looks at picture of pail
MOT points to picture of pail
MOT looks at the circus picture
<aft> MOT pulls the book onto her lap
MOT tries to pull CHI onto her lap
CHI pulls the book back from MOT and holds it
MOT puts CHI on her lap
CHI tries to take the book from MOT
MOT lets CHI take the book
CHI walks to the table and squeezes the duck
MOT looks at duck in CHI's hand
<bef> MOT reaches out and touches duck
CHI picks up the toy car
MOT puts the duck into the car
MOT puts the duck in the car
MOT puts the car on the floor and fits the duck inside
MOT tries to put the duck into the car
the duck falls out of the car
CHI picks the duck up and squeezes it
CHI squeezes the duck and then gives it to MOT
CHI runs over to the jack+in+the+box
CHI turns the handle of the jack+in+the+box
MOT puts CHI's hand on the box
CHI tries to turn the handle
CHI's back is to the camera for this jack+in+the+box segment
CHI turns handle a few turns then gives MOT the jack+in+the+box to hold
CHI taps the top of the box
CHI holds the jack+in+the+box on MOT's lap
<$=1> MOT reaches for the book and pulls it toward her
MOT turns the pages in the book
MOT points to a jack+in+the+box in the book

INV enters the room at 10:28:13 to explain Small Scale Activity to MOT then leaves the room while Small Scale Activity takes place . INV re-enters at 10:34:00 and explains the Forbidden Object task to MOT and has her sit next to MOT at the table . INV gives CHI the squeeze toy to hold
<aft> CHI reaches out to touch the object
CHI strains to touch the object
MOT puts her fingers on CHIs arm
CHI tries to touch the object
MOT puts her had on CHIs arm
CHI wiggles arm out of MOTs grasp
CHI touches the base of the object
INV taps the base of the object
CHI points to the object and looks behind himself
MOT looks closely and points to the baubles
CHI tries to touch the object
INV lets CHI touch the baubles before putting the object away
INV tells MOT about the Parent Child Interaction boxes . INV picks up the toys from the Small Scale Activity and the leaves the room
<aft> MOT puts the ball box on the floor
CHI runs over to the panda chair
MOT tosses ball up and down
CHI rubs his arms on the table top
MOT holds the ball out to CHI
MOT continues to hold the ball out
MOT begins to move toward CHI
MOT puts CHI in the middle of the room in front of the ball
MOT looks at CHI while reaching for the ball
CHI runs over to the table
MOT tosses ball up and down
CHI stands behind the table again
CHI reaches out his hand to the camera
<aft> CHI comes out from behind the table
MOT and CHI are off camera
MOT puts the ball in CHIs stomach
MOT gives CHI the ball while pushing him back a little
CHI lifts ball over his head and takes a few steps towards MOT . CHI throws the ball to MOT
CHI looks at MOT then looks at the camera . CHI looks at MOT
CHI backs up a few steps
CHI points to and looks at the camera . CHI looks at MOT
CHI swings his arms from side to side
<$=1> MOT holds ball in her lap
CHI walks to MOT and gives her the ball
CHI turns his back to MOT and swings his arms restlessly
CHI stares and reaches up toward camera
CHI looks at the camera . CHI looks at MOT

CHI throws the ball to MOT
MOT throws the ball into the air
MOT throws the ball up in the air
CHI turns to look at the ball
CHI comes towards MOT holding the ball
CHI gives MOT the ball and then runs off
MOT throws the ball into the air
CHI throws a piece of paper into the waste basket
MOT throws the ball into the air
CHI turns and walks toward MOT
<aft> MOT tosses the ball to CHI
CHI brushes past MOT and ignores the ball
CHI shakes loose from MOT's grasp
MOT gets up and puts the ball into the box
MOT puts the ball in the box and puts box on desk
CHI examines the straps on the chair
MOT puts the box on floor
MOT takes CHI off her lap and tries to sit him down
MOT keeps on hand on CHI as she reaches for the box
MOT raises blanket over her head

CHI looks into the empty box
MOT holds towel out to CHI

turns and walks away from MOT
MOT holds the cloth out for CHI to take
CHI bends down and looks beside the waste basket
<aft> MOT puts the cloth into the box
CHI stands and turns toward MOT
CHI walks toward MOT and then walks past her

MOT takes another box from the table
CHI is out of camera view
MOT takes the box from the table
<5-8> MOT points to paper with crayon
MOT puts the paper on top of the box
<aft> MOT moves box with paper in it away from CHI
MOT places the box cover with the paper on top in front of CHI
CHI sits in front of box
CHI stops drawing and looks at his paper
<aft> MOT reaches in the box for a piece of paper . MOT looks in box then MOT looks at CHI
CHI begins to draw in box cover
<$=1> MOT puts a paper down on box then puts it back in the box
MOT puts a piece of paper on the box top
CHI crawls to and reaches out for the box of paper
CHI looks in box and points to something
MOT puts the paper in front of CHI
MOT gives CHI a crayon from the box
CHI has his back to the camera
<aft> MOT slides the box in front of CHI
CHI looks at crayon in his hand
MOT reaches for paper that is underneath CHI
MOT leans forward and slides paper closer to CHI
CHI points to and looks at picture . CHI looks at MOT
<bef> MOT gives CHI the crayon back
MOT looks and points to CHI's drawing
CHI looks down at crayon in his hands
CHI points to what he just drew . <aft> CHI looks at MOT then looks at drawing
CHI looks at crayon in his hand
MOT puts crayon on the box
MOT leans closer to and looks at CHI
CHI makes some marks on the paper . CHI offers crayon to MOT
MOT accepts the crayon from CHI
MOT points to what CHI is drawing
CHI holds up the drawing into the air
CHI turns and puts his paper in the box
CHI is putting things into the box
CHI drops the crayons into the box
End of PCI - Crayons and Paper
MOT walks over to the desk with the crayons and paper box
CHI stands up and walks toward MOT
MOT walks to middle of floor with book box
CHI's hand is visible on camera
MOT steps back to middle of floor
CHI looks toward Harvard chair near door
MOT reaches out to CHI . <aft> MOT eases CHI down on her lap
CHI turns and sits on MOT's lap
MOT prepares to open the box
CHI struggles to climb out of MOT's lap
<$=2> MOT points to the numeral four on the box cover
MOT taps the lid of the box
CHI stares at the box cover
CHI touches the numeral four on the box
CHI tries to take cover off of box
MOT helps CHI take cover off box
CHI takes book out of box
CHI begins to open the book
MOT lifts CHI onto her lap
MOT points to the cover of the book
MOT points to and taps picture
CHI looks briefly on the opposite page . CHI looks at picture that MOT is pointing to
MOT points to the same picture
CHI closes the book and tries to climb off MOT's lap
MOT keeps CHI in her lap
CHI leans forward bending almost to the floor
CHI sits up in MOT's lap
while CHI tries to wriggle free MOT tries to hold him on her lap and show him the book
CHI leans out of MOT's lap and throws the book into the box
CHI tries to put the lid on the box
CHI tries to close the box properly
CHI tries to close the box properly
